name: ENTERPRISE
description: A towering titan of a design, the fact that the Enterprise moves at all, let alone with grace is due to the use of gravity-based technology to heavily reduce the effects of the square-cube law upon it. Layers of graviton shielding give the Enterprise substantial redundancies that allow it to blunt sustained assaults and protect allies with deflective fields that halt projectiles dead and bend beams away.

traits.name: GUARDIAN
traits.description: Allied characters may use the Enterprise for Hard Cover.

traits.name: HEAVY FRAME
traits.description: The Enterprise can’t be pushed, pulled, knocked prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

traits.name: PHOTON SPHERE
traits.description: The Enterprise cannot be Hidden or benefit from Invisible.

core_system.name: GRAVITON SHIELDING
core_system.active_effect: Gain Overshield equal to half your maximum HP or increase your current Overshield by half of your maximum HP. For the rest of the scene, you emit a burst 2 singularity shield. Any friendly character, including yourself, starting their turn within the singularity shield or entering it for the first time on their turn gains Overshield equal to your Grit.
core_system.description: Deep within the tough frame of the Enterprise is a massive graviton generator serving a dual role. While far from the holy grail of true anti-gravity, it lightens the massive frame of the Enterprise enough to actually act on a planetary surface. In addition, powerful gravity fluctuations give it resilient shielding to protect itself and allies with.
core_system.passive_effect: The Enterprise starts each scene with Overshield equal to half of its maximum HP. When the Enterprise has Overshield it gains +2 Armor (To a maximum of 4).

passive_synergies.detail: The Enterprise starts each scene with Overshield equal to half of its maximum HP. When the Enterprise has Overshield it gains +2 Armor (To a maximum of 4).

name: ATLANTIS
description: The SAE Atlantis is Scirocco Advanced Engineering’s first investment into non-gravity based mechs and rather a departure from the usual systems they design. Early on in the development of the SAE Enterprise, designs were failing to maintain core containment due to the excessive heat being generated by the graviton-based systems. The solution to this problem was developed in partnership with Azur-Rouze technologies and the creation of Vandenberg Paste. The SAE Atlantis is a heavy artillery frame, designed to deliver payloads of Vandenberg paste at long distances and provide exceptional battlefield control.

traits.name: THERMAL FRACTURE
traits.description: The Atlantis' attacks against characters in the Danger Zone or Exposed cannot have their damage or heat reduced by any means.

traits.name: HEAT REGULATION
traits.description: The Atlantis is immune to the negative effects of Extreme Heat and Extreme Cold environmental conditions.

core_system.name: VANDENBERG PASTE CANISTERS
core_system.active_effect: You vent temperature regulating mist over a burst 30 area until the end of your next turn. Allied characters in the affected area are immune to heat and hostile characters in the area cannot cool heat by any means other than overheating.
core_system.description: Each Atlantis mounts a series of heavy tanks storing the proprietary Vandenberg Paste. An exceptional thermal battery, Vandenberg paste can absorb huge amounts of heat that can be safely radiated out during maintenance or used as the payload in projectiles that can induce meltdowns or rapidly reduce targets to absolute zero, depending on if they are pre-loaded with the Atlantis' own heat or not.

passive_actions.name: HEAT SINK
passive_actions.detail: The triggering character gains resistance to that heat. However, you gain half the heat the target would gain before resistance. You cannot cool by any means other than overheating until the end of your next turn.
passive_actions.trigger: An allied character in sensors would gain heat.

name: ENDEAVOUR
description: The success of the Enterprise resulted in another mech in the Scirocco Advanced Engineering line very quickly, the Endeavour. The Endeavour is a contrast to its much larger kin, a slim frame barely larger than a hardsuit. At the core of this frame sits the latest generation of the Scirocco Graviton Generator, designed to power significant advances in gravity-based systems. These systems allow the Endeavour to easily ignore or amplify the effects of gravity upon itself and to reduce other frames to scrap metal with barely a touch.

traits.name: VARIABLE WEIGHT
traits.description: The Endeavour counts as size 3 for the purposes of ramming, knocking prone and involuntary movement. It ignores engagement from characters larger than itself, can share space with larger characters (even hostile ones) and move through their spaces unimpeded. While sharing space with any character, it gains soft cover, even from that character.

traits.name: SUBJECTIVE GRAVITY
traits.description: The Endeavour is immune to falling damage and treats all vertical, overhanging and liquid surfaces as flat ground for the purposes of movement.

core_system.name: GRAVITON GENERATOR
core_system.active_effect: For the rest of the scene, a character affected by your Grav-Warp trait is knocked Prone and Immobilized until the end of their next turn.
core_system.description: “Come at me, if you think you’re able to handle it! I’ll crumple your toys like tin cans!” -Dr Allzia, during the assault on NGHI

active_synergies.detail: For the rest of the scene, a character affected by your Grav-Warp trait is knocked Prone and Immobilized until the end of their next turn.

core_system.passive_effect: 1/round when a character fails a save forced by the Endeavour, they take 3 AP kinetic damage.

passive_synergies.detail: 1/round when a character fails a save forced by the Endeavour, they take 3 AP kinetic damage.

name: CHALLENGER
description: Contrary to man snipers, the Challenger defies expectations with implacable movement and surprising resilience. Using cutting edge sensor arrays tracking gravitational waves, even the most stealthy of foes will soon find themselves revealed. Backing up these sensors is a small but powerful graviton deflector array that can make minor adjustments to blunt incoming shots. The Challenger has become a centerpiece of SAE’s military catalogue both for base defence and for dealing with asymmetrical warfare.

traits.name: PREDICTIVE SHIELDING
traits.description: The Challenger gains Armor against any attack equal to the number of net Difficulty on the attack roll (to a maximum of 4).

traits.name: FINELY TUNED
traits.description: When the Challenger makes a check, save or attack with Accuracy, you may reroll any Accuracy die that rolls a 1 or a 2. You must take the new value, even if it is lower.

core_system.name: GRAVITATIONAL-WAVE INTERFEROMETER
core_system.active_effect:
Choose any number of characters in Range 50: those characters gain Lock On.

For the rest of the scene, the Challenger's Attacks gain the Seeking tag and ignore the effects of Invisible, Hidden and any status or effect that would prevent a character being targeted by attacks.
core_system.description: Holograms, Jammers and Optical Camouflage has made the job of detecting opposition increasingly complex. SAE’s solution to this problem has been to adapt a sensor array normally seen only on spaceships into a mech-scale module. As long as the foe has mass, they can be found.

active_synergies.detail: For the rest of the scene, the Challengers Attacks gain the Seeking tag and ignore the effects of Invisible, Hidden and any status or effect that would prevent a character being targeted by attacks.

core_system.passive_effect: The Challenger has +1 Accuracy on System Checks and Saves.

passive_synergies.detail: The Challenger has +1 Accuracy on System Checks and Saves.

name: INDEPENDENCE
description: A war is won or lost by control of the air, with even the walking titans of the battlefield unable to stand up against repeated assaults by high speed ground attack craft. In order to provide support to SAE’s many powerful but sluggish frames, the Independence was created to allow for mech-based domination of air combat. A massive design even by SAE’s standards, the Independence carries an entire wing of Subaltern Fighter Frames to provide close air support to allies and to create an uncontested zone of control for ground-based fighters.

traits.name: INTERCEPTOR SCREEN
traits.description: 1/round, when the Independence Bolsters a character, the target gains Soft Cover until the start of your next turn.

synergies.detail: 1/round, when the Independence Bolsters a character, the target gains Soft Cover until the start of your next turn.

traits.name: SLOW
traits.description: The Independence receives +1 Difficulty on Agility checks and saves.

synergies.detail: The Independence receives +1 Difficulty on Agility checks and saves

core_system.name: SUBALTERN SEMI-SAPIENT FIGHTERS
core_system.active_effect: You establish a Burst 50 zone of Air Supremacy until the end of the Scene. Hostile characters in the affected area are Impaired, Slowed and cannot Fly as long as they are within the area. A character can attempt to escape this effect by making a hull save as a quick action.
core_system.description: The massive bulk of the Independence conceals a large hangar bay containing heavy, armoured fighter drones. Requiring more space than traditional nexus weapons, the extra efficiency and responsiveness of the larger frames cannot be understated.
core_system.passive_effect:
1/Scene, when the Independence makes an attack with a Nexus weapon, that weapon gains one of the following benefits:
  • The weapon can attack an additional target in range.
  • The damage of this attack cannot be reduced by any means.
  • After the attack, the weapon immediately becomes reloaded.

name: DISCOVERY
description:
In order to support new colonies, significant artificial muscle is often required to clear forests, wrangle megafauna and aid in construction. The Discovery originally started life as a large colony support frame rather than a military machine, capable of serving the role of a dozen different pieces of heavy machinery. SAE’s trademark overengineering however resulted in a powerful frame that can rend military forces apart with its bare hands.

As a result it has become very popular in arena combat, where a seemingly unarmed mech taking on several other frames draws crowds and the corona created by its black hole engine has given it a distinctive look.

traits.name: INDUSTRIAL POWER
traits.description: The Discovery has +1 Accuracy on Hull Checks and Saves; and is treated as Size 4 for the purpose of Grappling, Lifting and Carrying Capacity.

synergies.detail: The Discovery has +1 Accuracy on Hull Checks and Saves; and is treated as Size 4 for the purpose of Grappling, Lifting and Carrying Capacity.

traits.name: HEAVY FRAME
traits.description: The Discovery can’t be pushed, pulled, knocked prone, or knocked back by smaller characters.

traits.name: PHOTON SPHERE
traits.description: The Discovery cannot be Hidden or benefit from Invisible.

core_system.name: BLACK HOLE ENGINE
core_system.active_effect:
For the rest of the scene, whenever a character engages or becomes engaged by the Discovery, they must pass a Hull save. On a failure, they become Grappled by the Discovery.

During this time, you are always treated as at least one size larger than the total Size of all characters you have Grappled and have Resistance to Damage, Burn and Heat from characters you have Grappled.
core_system.description: A potential replacement to the Graviton Generators that many SAE frames use, the Black Hole Engine has proven to be able to provide staggering levels of sheer power, if lacking the fine precision that SAE can manage from its usual systems.

active_synergies.detail: For the rest of the scene, whenever a character engages or becomes engaged by the Discovery, they must pass a Hull save. On a failure, they become Grappled by the Discovery. During this time, you are always treated as at least one size larger than the total Size of all characters you have Grappled and have Resistance to Damage, Burn and Heat from characters you have Grappled.

core_system.passive_effect: Hostile characters Grappled by the Discovery can only draw Line of Sight to adjacent spaces. In addition, the Discovery can take reactions while grappling.

name: COLUMBIA
description:
The brainchild of SAE’s Energy Conservation Labs, the SAE Columbia is built around a prototype viscoelastic metal that converts impacts into charge for its large capacitor. Pure efficiency in motion, the Columbia is undergoing field tests as a second line support mech mounting powerful energy redirection systems. Every impact and movement of the mech brings the capacitor one step closer to full charge and a terrifying flurry of motion it can unleash around itself as allies are driven into an overcharged frenzy.

Several Columbias are currently working alongside DOJ/HR units observing Operation Clarion, supposedly to provide safety to local civilians. HA suspects, however, that SAE is attempting to make overtures to local defence forces and demonstrate the benefit to buyers of a mech that can enhance even colonial troops into a force to be reckoned with.

traits.name: KE BARRIER
traits.description: When a scene starts, you can grant any number of characters in Sensors overshield equal to 2+Grit, or increase any existing overshield they have by 2+Grit.

traits.name: ABSORPTION
traits.description: The Columbia has Immunity to involuntary movement and falling damage.

core_system.name: KINETIC CAPACITOR
core_system.active_effect: Any number of characters in Range 50, other than yourself, may immediately take any Quick Action as a reaction.
core_system.description: Much of the energy the Columbia would lose as sound and waste heat is instead stored by the capacitor. This power can be drawn from at a moment’s notice to allow others to perform beyond specifications for a few moments.

passive_actions.name: CAPACITOR BLEED
passive_actions.detail: The triggering character can take 2 quick actions or full action on their next turn instead of just a single quick action. On your next turn, you may only take a single quick action instead of a full action or two quick actions.

name: PATHFINDER
description:
The aftermath of the fall of NGHI Innovations left a treasure trove of paracausal research and a rambling, incoherent mess of notes attempting to understand them. USB investigators soon found themselves utterly overwhelmed by the sheer quantity of data that needed to be analysed before the process of even cataloguing the research could be done, let alone anything productive made of them.

Scirocco Advanced Engineering had been contracted to provide support to the joint USB/UIB strike teams. This was done to prevent HA or SSC claiming any of the research for their own but also to take advantage of SAE’s excellent graviton research teams. After the operation was concluded, those research teams were asked to assist in the after-action analysis of NGHI’s data. The deal with SAE was very generous to the design company: SAE personnel would help the USB understand what NGHI had been working on and the USB would give them authorization to limited paracausal developments for their own use in the creation of the SAE Pathfinder; A prototype stealth mech that seemed able to absorb energy without limit.

traits.name: HIDDEN BLADE
traits.description: If the Pathfinder begins its turn Hidden, whenever it makes an attack that hits no targets and has no other effects (such as Reliable, etc), it ignores Loading and Heat (self), does not consume limited charges, and does not break Hidden.

traits.name: BLACKBODY OBJECT
traits.description: Search actions targeting the Pathfinder require Line of Sight and it has Immunity to Lock On.

core_system.name: ENDLESS VOID
core_system.active_effect: Choose any number of characters in Range 50. For the rest of the scene, they do not have Line of Sight beyond Range 5 of themselves and cannot make any attack without Line of Sight to the target. During this time, you do not have line of sight outside of Sensors and cannot make any attack without line of sight to the target.
core_system.description: The Pathfinder’s plating is dark enough to absorb all light that touches it, soaking up heat and movement like a sponge. A massive torrent of energy does not cause the darkness to abate, instead causing it to grow and consume the light around others.

active_synergies.detail: Choose any number of characters in Range 50. For the rest of the scene, they do not have Line of Sight beyond Range 5 of themselves and cannot make any attack without Line of Sight to the target. During this time, you do not have line of sight outside of Sensors and cannot make any attack without line of sight to the target.

name: INSPIRATION
description:
Subaltern boarding teams are a staple of space combat, the expendable robots traditionally controlled by remote control or a partition of an NHP. Scirocco Advanced Engineering's new BLADE Subaltern squad is, however, rather different. The squad is mentally linked to a human in the Inspiration frame itself, acting as coordinator and squad leader to a unit of heavy subalterns.

Initial tests have shown significant improvements in efficiency over traditional boarding teams such as IPS-N’s PIPECLEANER Subalterns. A more humanoid look has also helped public acceptance of BLADE Subalterns, making them seem trustworthy and friendly rather than inhuman troops...no matter the fact they could tear metal with their bare hands.

traits.name: INTO THE BREACH
traits.description: At the start of any scene, after deployment but before the first character begins their turn the Inspiration can move its speed. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

traits.name: DESTRUCTION'S HERALD
traits.description: The Inspiration has Immunity to attacks and damage from itself and allied characters.

core_system.name: "BLADE" SUBALTERNS
core_system.active_effect: For the rest of the scene, you can't roll lower than a 10 on a d20 and the final attack roll of attacks against you cannot be affected by accuracy.
core_system.description: Mind-Linked Subalterns allow the Inspiration to move with the coordination of a single being despite multiple bodies.
core_system.passive_effect: The Inspiration occupies the space of a Size 3 character and is treated as Size 1 for the purposes of ramming, carrying and grappling; though it is otherwise treated as its actual size. It ignores engagement from characters larger than it and can move through their spaces unimpeded. As long as the Inspiration occupies at least 2 free spaces it can overlap obstructions, cover, or other characters; though it cannot make movements that would pass entirely through such obstructions without a path.
